text: Bought my CNY plants from Lovely Landscape. We‚Äôve been to many nurseries across the island, but seldom see one that is packed with plants that are notably well cared for, not to also mention that the variety of plants relative to the nursery size is impressive. We were served by Johan, an experienced staff who was personable and patient with our multiple questions and requests. He readily went on to serve the other customers who quickly approached him after us. Thanks for the pleasant experience! üëçüèªüí™üèªüòÅ

Was recommended here by my bro, strongly recommend to look for Johan. Indeed a very pro person to give me plenty of tips to take care of my plants. Helped to repot my purchase to my own pot. Pricing were reasonable. I like his confidence and knowledge. His other colleagues were friendly too. Love my buying experience with Lovely üòä

I am writing to express my sincere gratitude for the exception service that your staff Mr. JOHAN provided during my recent visit to your nursery. His commitment to ensuring customer satisfaction did not go unnoticed, and l felt compelled to commend him for his outstanding efforts. From the moment l entered the nursery, his warm greeting and genuine willingness to assist were evident. His professionalism and attention to detail of plants knowledge throughout our interactions were truly commendable. He took the time to listen to my needs attentively and provide me with prompt and thorough assistance. His dedication to delivering high-quality service is a testament to his work ethic and reflects positively on your company. Thank you once again for your exceptional service.

I bought more than $1k of indoor plants from them. When I was buying they were very friendly. Within a week, the plants started to wither and leaves started dropping and turning yellow. When I contacted them, the salesmen said the problem is my house and not their plants. He also said, there‚Äôs no warranty or guarantee on plants.
I will not recommend this nursery to anyone. They take your money and give you very bad service! I‚Äôm now left with dying indoor plants, spend more money to replace them. Certainly will not go back to them.
Great nursery with extensive variety of plants and flowers! Friendly and knowledgeable staff. Was served by Anand who helped guided our selection and potted our new plants nicely!
